ftueAnalysis.criterion: Splash Screen to Interactive Game Time
ftueAnalysis.observations: Takes about 8 seconds to get from splash screen to interactive gameplay, which is slightly longer than recommended.
ftueAnalysis.suggestedImprovements: Consider optimizing initial load time to under 5 seconds for better user retention.

ftueAnalysis.observations: Multiple loading screens observed with durations up to 12 seconds, which is too long for mobile users.
ftueAnalysis.suggestedImprovements: Reduce loading times to under 3 seconds or add engaging elements during loading to maintain user interest.

ftueAnalysis.observations: All permission requests are preceded by clear explanations of why they are needed and how they benefit the user.
Tutorial is mandatory with no option to skip, which may frustrate experienced players.
ftueAnalysis.suggestedImprovements: Add a clearly visible skip option for the tutorial to accommodate experienced users.

ftueAnalysis.observations: All text elements maintain consistent language throughout the experience, matching the device language.
Login is mandatory but offers multiple options (email, Google, Facebook). Explanation of benefits is minimal.
ftueAnalysis.suggestedImprovements: Provide clearer explanation of the benefits of logging in and consider offering a 'play as guest' option.

ftueAnalysis.observations: Automatic Google Play Services login is implemented and works smoothly when the user is already signed in.
3 interstitial ads and 2 purchase modals shown during FTUE, which is excessive and disrupts the experience.
ftueAnalysis.suggestedImprovements: Remove or significantly reduce interstitials during FTUE. Delay purchase modals until after the user has experienced core gameplay.

ftueAnalysis.observations: Options menu is easily accessible via a clearly visible gear icon in the top right corner.
The 'Start Game' button is prominently displayed and clearly labeled, making it intuitive to begin gameplay.
Profile is visible but customization options are limited to avatar selection and username.
ftueAnalysis.suggestedImprovements: Consider adding more profile customization options to increase user engagement and personalization.

ftueAnalysis.observations: Found 2 instances where screens took more than 3 seconds to load with no loading indicator or feedback.
ftueAnalysis.suggestedImprovements: Add loading indicators or progress bars for all transitions that take longer than 3 seconds.
